name: Arion Vidales
story: Arion Vidales grew up in a small village in Greece, where he developed a passion for driving at a young age. He moved to the city to pursue his dream of becoming a professional driver and found work with a local underground racing crew. Despite his success on the streets, Arion yearns for a more legitimate career as a driver, and has recently started working for Bluking, a local transportation company.
